static_hints:
Use LEFT and RIGHT
ARROW KEYS to walk.
Press SPACE or Z to jump.

Use UP and DOWN
ARROW to climb.

Use UP ARROW to interact
with objects.

Press DOWN + ATTACK
to perform a
down attack.
item_hints:
Press LEFT CTRL or X to
attack.
item1:
It's a sword made of paper.
It might look harmless, but
at least the risk of paper
cuts is real.
story_intro:
A thousand times you
have died...

A thousand times I
have brought you
back...

Once again, I need
your help...

So wake up, it is
time for one last
adventure!
npc1:
Good morning, stranger! See
that ruined portal over 
there? They say that it
will take you to another
world.

Or, at least it used to.
It was already broken when
I came here, and that was
at least a thousand years
ago.
npc2:
They say that the shop-
keeper is older than the
time itself. Sounds like
nonsense, you might
think.

However, it is true, mostly
because it was the shop-
keeper who invented time.
I think that happened
about three years ago.
npc3:
Travellers usually ask us
if these caverns are
natural or built by the
humans.

They never believe me
when I tell them that
these caverns were
naturally built by the
humans.
shop_item_desc:
Hearts and magic
bottles are
more efficient.
nomoney:
You don't have
enough money to
buy this item!
shop_confirm:
Buy this item for
% gold coins?
shopitem1:
It increases your maximal
life by one!
shopitem2:
It increases your
maximal magic... uh, bar.
shopitem3:
They might be made out of
wood, but considering how
weak you are, they still
make you stronger.
shopitem4:
You obtain a can of MAGIC
BEANS!

These things are illegal
in most countries, but
they do make you feel
magical!
shopitem5:
It seems to be made of
aluminum foil, but it
boosts your confidence,
which reduces the damage
you take.
shopitem6:
This watch runs slightly
slower than an ordinary
clock, which makes your
attacks faster. Don't
ask why, though.
shopitem7:
You obtain a bottle of
LIVER OIL!

Cod liver? You wish.
It increases your vitality,
making certain pick up
items more efficient.
